sentences.sContent: He heavily expurgated the work in its second edition.
sentences.sCn: 在第二版中，他大幅删减了该作品。

remMethod.val: ex (出) + purg (洗) + ate → 把脏东西洗出去 → 洗去 → 删除

words.tran: 删除（expurgate的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: If someone expurgates a piece of writing, they remove parts of it before it is published because they think those parts will offend or shock people
